workData.title: Setup Your Wallet
workData.text: Set up Metamask to work with the Rinkeby testnet until we go live.
workData.text2: We use Polygon as of now so you will need to send to setup Polygon with Metamask

workData.title: Take a Test
workData.text: Play educational games or take math and programming quizzes to test your skill.

workData.title: Earn LEARN Tokens
workData.text: Claim Learn tokens every two weeks.  The more you learn, the more you earn!

workData.title: Compete with Others
workData.text: Compare your skills with other learners and see how you stack up in our leaderboards
